SEARCH
Module HW1_forStudents
Package core

Class Player

java.lang.Object
core.Person
core.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Player>
public class Player extends Person implements Comparable<Player>
Represents a player with specific attributes such as skills, fans count, and participation count. Extends the Person class and implements Comparable interface for comparison based on player ID.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String pId, String pFullName, short age, String nation, int pNum, int fansCount, Role[] skills, int euroParticipationCount)
      Constructs a Player object with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      pId - The ID of the player.
      pFullName - The full name of the player.
      age - The age of the player.
      nation - The country of the player, represented as a string.
      pNum - The player's number.
      fansCount - The number of fans the player has.
      skills - The array of roles representing the player's skills.
      euroParticipationCount - The count of the player's participation in the Euro.
